wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{| class="wikitable-green" </noinclude>
|- style="background:{{{th-color|}}}; "
!colspan="2" |{{{Name}}}
|- valign="top" style="background:{{{td-color|}}};"
|width="200px" |{{#if: {{{image|}}} | [[File:{{{image}}}|200px]] | [[File:Transparent_Akkarin.jpg|200px]] }} 
|rowspan="2" |{{{info|}}}
|- style="background:{{{cv-color|}}};"
|CV：{{{CV|未知}}}
<noinclude>|}</noinclude>
